layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x44
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x44
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x28
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 600x28 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 598x26
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 598x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 296x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 215x18
                text run at (2,2) width 215: "Cell text should be center aligned"
